meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Keller Neil Quarterman Jim Sears Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2307.

td.p: Chris Keller, a data processing consultant from Cherry Hill, New Jersey
Neil Quarterman, a foreign service officer from Washington, D.C.
Jim Sears, a transit analyst from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,000)

tr.td: FIRST LADIES
TELEVISION
WORLD ALMANAC 1893
LOUISIANA
GAMBLING
PREFIXES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Sarah Phillips designed the stunning violet gown this first lady wore to the 1993 inaugural balls')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Sarah Phillips designed the stunning violet gown this first lady wore to the 1993 inaugural balls

cheers

$2,000
Bonnie Blair')
